amendment.description: To prohibit assistance to North Korea under title II of the Food for Peace Act unless the President issues a national interest waiver.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2454 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 144.

action.text: Amendment SA 2454 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S4338-4339; text: CR S4338) To prohibit assistance to North Korea under title II of the Food for Peace Act unless the President issues a national interest waiver.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2454 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 144.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2454 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 144.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2454 proposed by Senator Kerry.
